item.title: Moving my blog to Hugo
item.description: If you’re a regular reader of my blog, you probably noticed that the design has changed. In fact, it’s not just the design, it’s just about everything! My blog used to be hosted on WordPress. It did the job, but honestly, I didn’t really like WordPress. It’s slow, bloated, and the editing and publishing experience is a bit of a mess (or at least, it’s not a good fit for the way I like to work).
